FYI- the August 15 deadline may not apply to all on that list,

NCAA had issued a Covid exception, for athletes in sports whose seasons were affected,

allowed an option for an extra year(s) of eligibility,

(see guys like Easton Brodzinski and some teammates,who played 5 full NCAA seasons at St Cloud

Easton Brodzinski Hockey Stats and Profile at hockeydb.com

Statistics of Easton Brodzinski, a hockey player from Blaine, MN born Aug 13 1996 who was active from 2015 to 2023.

My understanding is that drafted NCAA players who remain enrolled

will have additional year(s) of NHL rights-retention for their drafting teams until they leave school or their eligibility is exhausted

Jaromir Pytlik

I should note that coming into the season it was listed on Cap Friendly that the Devils had to sign him by June 1 or lose his rights. Now Cap Friendly is listing the Devils as holding his rights until June 1, 2024, which would give them more time to track his development.

A Look at the Probabilities for the New Jersey Devils Prospects

In today’s post, I’ll be taking a look at how the Devils’ prospects project via the Hockey Prospecting model and see which prospects have their stock going up.
